item.title: Democratic Rep. Gerry Connolly of Virginia dies after battling cancer
item.description: Members of Congress paused their battle over President Donald Trump's massive tax bill to hold a moment of silence in Connolly's honor.

item.title: Noem says Trump can deport who he wants, botches what 'habeas corpus' means
item.description: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem spoke after White House aide Stephen Miller floated suspending the writ of habeas corpus for migrants.

item.title: Trump unveils plans for 'Golden Dome' missile defense system
item.description: President Donald Trump wants to create a missile defense shield system for the United States that is akin to Israel's Iron Dome.

item.title: Trump fails to convince 'SALT Caucus' to back tax bill
item.description: President Donald Trump told House Republicans, 'Donâ€™t f--- around with Medicaid,' in a closed-door meeting on a major tax bill he wants passed this we...

item.title: Elon Musk says he will spend 'a lot less' on future campaign donations
item.description: Elon Musk, the CEO of Tesla and SpaceX and the face of DOGE, has been a major presence in D.C. since President Donald Trump's electoral victory.
